faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: No, MedDiscover is a referral platform. We connect patients with verified international clinics and support the entire process.
faq.a2: All partner clinics undergo a rigorous vetting process. We consider international accreditations, physician experience, and patient satisfaction.
faq.a3: Consultation and referral through MedDiscover are completely free for you. You only pay for the treatment directly to the clinic.
faq.q4: In which countries do you operate?
faq.a4: We work with clinics in Turkey, Germany, and other European countries. Depending on the treatment, we recommend the most suitable region.
faq.a5: Your data is processed in compliance with GDPR standards and stored encrypted. We only share your information with partner clinics with your explicit consent.
